div.h2: Senior Camera Hardware Systems Design Engineer

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The camera hardware team is responsible for design, development, and validation of all camera systems and modules in Apple products. The senior engineer in this role will take end-to-end responsibility for system modeling, system trade-offs, and data analysis of camera hardware and sensor systems that incorporate camera hardware. This multi-functional role requires highly analytical skills in system design parameters, in system concept development, system evaluation, data analysis, and reporting of conclusions.

ul.li: Experience with lock-in pixels, high speed modulation/demodulations system and high speed / high power emitter.
Strong knowledge of imaging physics and system modeling.
Strong background in testing and characterization of high accuracy electro-optical system.
Proficiency in MATLAB for data analysis and simulations setups.
Excellent written and reporting skills for clear reporting of data analysis and conclusions.

div.p: Key contributor to end-to-end implementation of system simulations, system modeling and evaluation. Reporting of simulation analysis based on high-level system description. Engagement of cross-functional discussion with non-imaging teams and map their imaging needs to sensing implementations. Engagement with cross-functional teams to discuss implications and trade-offs on camera HW and sensor system performance.
Master's or higher in related engineering field
